title: Module 1: What's the Need of Router Nitro & Why to Use it?
description: Welcome to the Module 1 Of the Router Nitro CookBook. In this Module, we'll be Understanding that what's the Need of Router Nitro? Why cross-chain Interoperability needs to be Catered and why should you only prefer Router Nitro? Let's Begin...
